attributes.action: Provide funding for a review of the efficacy of Pineal Gland Surgery
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that such a review could provide valuable insights and inform future treatment options, ultimately benefiting those affected by this condition.

We propose an independent panel, composed of leading experts in the field to conduct this urgent review of the scientific literature related to pineal cysts and their management. This review would aim to provide recommendations based on the latest evidence.
 
Let us choose our destiny.
attributes.background: We would like the government to fund a review to explore the extent to which surgical intervention can alleviate the symptoms experienced by individuals with pineal cysts.
